Package com.terturl.MMO.MMOEntity.BlockBenchObjects

Class BBOBone

java.lang.Object
com.terturl.MMO.MMOEntity.BlockBenchObjects.BBOBone
public class BBOBone extends Object
A more indepth depiction of the BBOOutliner and holds more information that will be used to update the location of MMOMob parts
Since:
0.58.0
Author:
Sean Rahman

      Create a bone with the following global offset and local rotation

      x - Bone's X location

      z - Bone's Z location
      rx - Bone's X rotation
      ry - Bone's y rotation
      rz - Bone's Z rotation
